actions.welcome: Feel free to explore my portfolio and reach out

summary: I'm a Fullstack Developer with over 3 years of experience creating dynamic, user-friendly, and scalable web applications. I'm passionate about building seamless digital experiences and solving real-world problems through clean, efficient code.

experiences.title: Web Developer - Consultant
experiences.description: I was employed at PhinCon (Phintraco Consulting), an IT consulting firm known for delivering top-tier, comprehensive IT solutions and support products. My duties involved creating and sustaining high-quality web applications, covering both front-end and back-end development, along with some DevOps responsibilities.
responsibilities: Utilize expertise in UI Designs to formulate and implement high-quality, responsive web solutions using the scrum methodology.
As part of the DevOps team, managed the Dockerization of the web UI to facilitate seamless service migration and deployment.
Enhanced performance and strengthened web security through the implementation of code obfuscation and splitting techniques.
Integrated RESTful APIs to optimize data exchange between the frontend and backend, ensuring efficient handling of diverse data sets for expected responses.

experiences.title: Fullstack Web Developer
experiences.description: Developed a fast and responsive web application used in an accounting competition organized by UNS students, focusing on delivering seamless UI/UX and real-time database integration.
responsibilities: Built and integrated login and dashboard pages using Node.js and Firestore for real-time data handling
Translated UI designs from Figma into a fully responsive interface using React.js and Tailwind CSS
Ensured cross-device compatibility and smooth performance for competition participants and judges

experiences.title: Web Developer
experiences.description: Collaborated on building and maintaining an internal web platform with focus on frontend design, API integration, and UI consistency.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented the login and dashboard UI based on Figma mockups
Integrated data from backend services using Axios and ensured dynamic content rendering
Improved UI layout and responsiveness across various screen sizes using SASS and CSS3

quoteOfTheDay.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

quoteOfTheDay.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quoteOfTheDay.author: Steve Jobs

quoteOfTheDay.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

quoteOfTheDay.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.

quoteOfTheDay.text: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quoteOfTheDay.author: Thomas Edison

quoteOfTheDay.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quoteOfTheDay.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quoteOfTheDay.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quoteOfTheDay.author: Confucius

quoteOfTheDay.text: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
quoteOfTheDay.author: Steve Jobs

quoteOfTheDay.text: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quoteOfTheDay.author: Alan Kay

quoteOfTheDay.text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quoteOfTheDay.author: Lao Tzu

projects.title: Smart Anthro IoT Project
projects.summary: An IoT-based project developed for a thesis by UMY graduate students, combining multiple physical sensors to create a smart anthropometric tool called 'Smart Anthro'. The system integrates ultrasonic and load cell sensors with a Node.js REST API via MQTT protocol and connects to a mobile app built using React Native.
projects.goals: To build a smart anthropometry device that can accurately measure a child's height and weight, send the data to a server in real-time, and store it in a PostgreSQL database to help monitor and manage child nutrition.
projects.takeaways: This project was a significant challenge due to the need to coordinate hardware sensors, microcontroller programming, and real-time data communication over Wi-Fi using MQTT. The solution also required seamless integration between IoT devices, a backend API, and a mobile app for visualizing nutritional trends like underweight or overweight conditions.

projects.title: SSGI 2024 Dashboard
projects.summary: A national-scale dashboard developed for the Indonesian Ministry of Health to visualize the results of the Survei Status Gizi Indonesia (SSGI) 2024. The platform provides comprehensive access to nutritional survey data across all provinces in Indonesia.
projects.goals: To build an interactive, data-driven dashboard that displays national nutritional statistics using maps, charts, and tables, and to monitor field survey progress by tracking enumerator activity and completion status across provinces.
projects.takeaways: This project involved integrating complex data from multiple databases (PostgreSQL and MariaDB), managing geospatial data, and ensuring smooth frontend-backend communication. It was deployed on the Ministry of Health's server using PM2 for process management.

projects.title: Sarangkata - A Storytelling Platform (Unreleased - Joint Project)
projects.summary: Sarangkata is a creative storytelling platform that supports multiple story formats, including chat-based stories, chaptered narratives, and short stories. Users can write, publish, and read stories directly from the platform.
projects.goals: To develop a flexible and engaging storytelling web platform that empowers writers and readers to interact with various narrative formats in a modern digital environment.
projects.takeaways: Although the project was not completed due to business constraints, it showcased the integration of advanced frontend and backend technologies, emphasizing scalable architecture using Next.js, GraphQL, and TypeScript.

projects.title: Handayani Fiber Landing Page
projects.summary: A responsive landing page built to promote Handayani Fiber, a local internet service provider. The website features service highlights and a registration form integrated with WhatsApp for direct customer communication.
projects.goals: To create a clean, mobile-friendly promotional site that allows potential customers to quickly learn about Handayani Fiber's internet services and easily submit inquiries through WhatsApp.
projects.takeaways: This project emphasized the importance of user-centric UI/UX for conversion-driven landing pages. Integrating seamless WhatsApp communication improved customer interaction and lead generation.
